title.narrative: (2012) Intermediate Results (IR) 106 - Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH)

description.narrative: Programme is managed efficiently and effectively to achieve the objectives, which contributes to Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: To contribute to the reduction of neonatal mortality by 30 percent, under 5 years of age mortality by 30 percent and maternal mortality by at least 25% by end 2014
